mapper.sql: id, created_at, created_by, updated_at, updated_by, cellphone, nickname
mapper.insert:
insert into customer
created_at,
created_by,
updated_at,
updated_by,
cellphone,
nickname,

mapper.update:
update customer
created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updated_by = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cellphone = #{cellphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update customer set created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_by = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cellphone = #{cellphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
